participant_1.background:
I am a quiet, but hardworking individual who is eager to learn and contribute to your company.
i am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
I think my pets are the best things in my life.
i do not have a job and sit on the couch all day.
I collect fantasy novels to expand my mind and escape from the real world.

participant_2.background:
My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib.
i drive a black car.
i am a great cook.
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.

content.text: Good, thanks! I am about to go for a run. How about you?
I am doing well! I am just hanging out and watching TV.
I am watching a documentary about the history of the United States.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I love history.
Me too! What is your favorite historical period?
I am not sure. I think I like the Renaissance period the best.
That is a great choice! I love the Renaissance period too.
What is your favorite thing about the Renaissance period?
I love the art and architecture. The Renaissance period was a time of great creativity and innovation.
I agree! The Renaissance period was a time of great change and progress.
It was amazing to see how much the world changed during that time.
It was truly amazing! I wish I could have lived in the Renaissance period.
Me too! It would have been amazing to experience all of the changes and progress that was happening.
I think it would have been an amazing time to be alive.
